class_notes:
(Permission of instructor is required)
(This is the first semester of the two-semester Biology Honors Program available to  SENIORS -in their last two semesters at Emory- with a 3.5 GPA or higher)
(Prerequisites:  Biology 142 + 142L, and declared Biology major.  See Biology Department website for additional information)
course_description: Prerequisite: consent of departmental honors coordinator. Independent research for students invited to participate in the biology department Honors Program.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
